sense.name: A collection of things that have been assembled together.
sense.examples: A combination of records and tapes rested in the corner. We see a large combination of elements in this art.

sense.name: A coordinated sequence of (chess) moves.
sense.examples: The player made a brilliant combination. The martial artist knew several key combinations.

sense.name: A sequence that opens a lock.
sense.examples: He forgot the combination to the safe. We should set a new combination at the end of the day.

sense.name: A group (of people) assembled.
sense.examples: They were a winning combination. The combination of US and Russian officials made for a good team.

sense.name: The act of arranging elements together.
sense.examples: We made a combination of several features. The police made a combination or men for the lineup.
